item.description: Breslin replaces Dr. Jason Wysong, who was removed earlier this year.

item.description: While many are preparing for track meets, volleyball matches, and football games each week this time of the year, some are doing martial arts.

Sarasota County Schools Cuts Ribbon on new Agricultural Learning Facility
item.description: The farm isn’t just about learning. It will also help increase food production from farm-to-cafeteria.

item.title: At least 3 people critically injured in shooting at Colorado high school, officials say
item.description: Officials said the activity was first reported Wednesday at a high school in Jefferson County, Colorado.

item.title: Harvest Sarasota invites community to paint rainbow crosswalk
item.description: On Sunday, September 14th, the Harvest is inviting community members to help paint a Pride crosswalk on The Harvest Sarasota/Harvest House campus, located at 3650 17th Street in Sarasota.

item.title: Appeals court finds Florida’s open carry ban unconstitutional
item.description: Florida Republican Gov. Ron DeSantis applauded the decision in a post on X.

item.title: As Turning Point founder, Charlie Kirk has been vital in building support for Republicans among young people
item.description: Charlie Kirk is a prominent conservative activist who embodies the pugnacious and populist approach to politics under Donald Trump’s Republican party.

item.title: Conservative activist Charlie Kirk dead after being shot at university event; person of interest in custody, FBI says
item.description: Charlie Kirk, a well-known conservative political activist, died after he was shot in the neck at an event at Utah Valley University on Wednesday, according to President Donald Trump.
